long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An essential extension for facilitating Evivve - The Leadership Game. 

The extension is specifically designed for facilitators who wish to run Evivve on their Chrome browsers.

The purpose of this extension is to manage cache that gets generated while you host a game. It is designed to prevent cache and data mixing between multiple games you might run. 

We hope using this extension enables you to run more powerful and effective learning experiences. 

For support, please contact developer on the right.
